mapper.select: select count(*) from place where place_location like '%'||#{place_location}||'%'
select * from (select rownum rnum, a.* from (select * from place where place_location like '%'||#{place_location}||'%')a) where rnum >=#{startRow} and rnum <=#{endRow}
mapper.update: update place set place_star=#{place_star} where place_code=#{place_code}
